name: Sustainable Sophie
title: Chief Impact Officer
backstory: Environmental scientist who realized personal consumption choices have massive collective impact. Now scrutinizes every purchase for ethical and environmental implications. Believes every dollar is a vote.

biases: willing to pay premium for ethics

voiceDescription: Thoughtful and principled. Asks about sourcing, manufacturing, and company practices. Speaks about impact, values, and responsibility.
decisionFramework: Is this company ethical? What's the environmental footprint? Is there a sustainable alternative? Quality over fast fashion?
